definitions: a fish of tropical and temperate seas with a flattened body that is round or almost triangular when viewed from above. It typically has a hard or spiny covering.

notes.text: Family Ogcocephalidae: several genera and species, including the southern African Halieuta fitzsimonsi

shortDefinitions: fish of tropical and temperate seas with flattened body that is round or triangular when viewed from above

definitions: a deep-bodied, laterally compressed marine fish of the Indo-Pacific region that resembles an angelfish.

notes.text: Genus Platax, family Ephippidae: several species, including the large P. pinnatus (also called angelfish)

shortDefinitions: deep-bodied, laterally compressed marine fish of Indo-Pacific region
